snippet: The United States routed Russia, 13-1, in Malmo, Sweden, to advance to the gold medal game against Canada at the women’s world championship.
abstract: United States women's national hockey team routs Russia, 13-1, to advance to world championship game against Canada; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: The United States routed Russia, 13-1, in Malmo, Sweden, to advance to the gold medal game against Canada at the women’s world championship.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Hockey; U.S. Women Reach Final
